content.rendered:
Directed by Claire Denis

Written by Claire Denis. Denis Johnson. Andrew Litvack. Léa Mysius

Star Margaret Qualley(Trish). Joe Alwyn(Daniel). Benny Safdie(CIA Man). Danny Ramirez(Costa Rican Cop). Nick Romano(Subteniente). Stephan Proaño(Vice-Minister). Monica Bartholomew(La Señora). Carlos Bennett(Mercado Taxi Driver). Sebastian Donoso(Taxi Driver Trish). Hector Moreno(Travel Agent). Robin Duran(Costa Rican Border Captain). Jose Leonel Hernandez(Nightwatch Man). Cristian Pulido(Taxi Driver Daniel). Luis Franco(Waiter in Chartreuse Vest). Steven Garcia(Telcor Teen Guard). Rogelio Chung(Telcor Man at Counter). Dayan Rodriguez(Tire Boy). Benito Tuñon(Tire Boy). Moises Caballero(Tire Boy). Bayardo Peralta(Tire Boy). Emmanuel Barahona(Tire Boy). Alexis Quintero(Coyote). Carlos Serrano(Border Bar Tender). Carlos Trujillo(Vice-Minister’s Waiter). Maria Quintero(Intercontinental Receptionist). Ariel Ortega(Fast Food Restaurant Employee). Daniel Diaz(Teen Travel Agent). Katia Semacarit(Vice-Minister’s Secretary). Miguel Rodriguez(Intercontinental Bartender). Luis Barrios(Waiter Los Periquitos). Gustavo Pérez(Man with Costa Rican Cop). Miroslava Morales(Hamzat Woman). Elvira Rodriguez(Hamzat Woman (as Elvira ‘Ellie’ Rodríguez)). Mark Headley(Border Policeman (as Mark ‘Tello’ Headley)). Alejandro Castroverde(Border Soldier). John C. Reilly(American Magazine Editor). Larry Diaz(Car Owner). Carlos Serrano(Old barman owner (uncredited))

Language English. French. Spanish

Producers Emilien Bignon. Brahim Chioua. Olivier Delbosc. Eva Diederix. Valérie Farthouat. Olivier Gauriat. Marcela Heilbron. Olivier Hélie. Lorena Lopez. Vincent Maraval. Pituka Ortega-Heilbron

Production Ad Vitam Production. Arte France Cinéma. Barnstormer Productions
